articles.author: Leila Abboud
articles.title: Emmanuel Macron seeks to calm public anger over French pensions reform - Financial Times
articles.description: President says unpopular changes are ‘necessity’ and are likely to take effect by end of 2023
articles.content: French president Emmanuel Macron on Wednesday defended his unpopular plan to raise the retirement age as key to repairing the public finances and sought to calm public anger over his governments deci… [+3720 chars]
